days.scripture_text: Return to me with all your heart, with fasting and weeping and mourning. Rend your heart and not your garments.
days.reflection: What needs to be torn open in your heart today?
days.companion_quote: Man shall not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes from the mouth of God.

days.scripture_text: Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.
days.companion_quote: The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.

days.scripture_text: Is not this the fast that I choose: to loose the bonds of wickedness, to undo the straps of the yoke?
days.reflection: What bonds need loosening in your life?
days.companion_quote: I will arise and go to my father, and I will say to him, 'Father, I have sinned.'

days.scripture_text: When you fast, anoint your head and wash your face, that your fasting may not be seen by others but by your Father who is in secret.
days.reflection: What hidden sacrifices can you offer today?
days.companion_quote: Sir, give me this water, so that I will not be thirsty.

days.scripture_text: Then Jesus was led up by the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted by the devil. And after fasting forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.
days.reflection: How is the Spirit leading you into the wilderness this Lent?

days.liturgical_label: Monday of the First Week of Lent
days.scripture_text: You shall be holy, for I the Lord your God am holy.
days.reflection: What does holiness look like in your daily choices?

days.liturgical_label: Tuesday of the First Week of Lent
days.scripture_text: So shall my word be that goes out from my mouth; it shall not return to me empty, but it shall accomplish that which I purpose.
days.reflection: How is God's word working in you right now?
